body.header: What will I learn in this unit?

section.p: You will listen to patients talking to their doctor or dentist and match their symptoms to medical conditions.
You will complete the notes a student made during an introductory lecture on food science and then listen to the lecture and check your answers.

font.b: Infectious diseases - causes, prevention and treatment

section.p: You will group words according to whether they are related to the causes of infectious diseases or to their prevention and treatment. You will complete sentences with appropriate words.
